item.title: Tutorial: nginx
item.description: Welcome to GeekOops! This post acts as a tutorial to start with the first role of this project: Installing and configuring a nginx webserver via the geekoops-nginx role. Tutorial Let’s assume we want to roll this role out on our imaginary jellyfish server. We need to have root ssh access to jellyfish. Ansible also supports sudo, but this is not covered here.
